reference.shortdesc: A citation is the name or the title of a bibliographic resource, for example, a document, online article, or instructional video.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the cite element is typically rendered in a way that distinguishes it from the surrounding text.

section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.
